```{r}
#Read in pluto data
pluto = read_csv("RawData/pluto/bk11v2.txt")
```

```{r}
pluto %>%
  select(CT2010, SchoolDist, ZoneDist1, LotArea, ComArea, ResArea, RetailArea) %>%
  filter(!is.na(CT2010)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(ZoneDist1)) %>%
  mutate(zone = case_when(grepl("/", ZoneDist1) ~ "MR",
                          !grepl("/", ZoneDist1) ~ str_sub(ZoneDist1, 1, 1))) 
```
